page.title: 08Recreation-games
page.content:
"When we are at school we play skipping in the school yard.Here are some of the rhymes we sing as we skip." 1. Not last night but the night before Twenty-four robbers came knocking at my door As I went out to let them in This is what they began to sing:- Senorita turn around Senorita touch the ground Senorita do the high kicks Senorita do the splits.
2. Jelly on the plate, Jelly on the plate, Wibble wobble,wibble wobble, Jelly on the plate
3. Hi low dolly wally hop skip jump pepper(incresing speed)
